package day2;

class Animal {
    void eat() {
        System.out.println("Animal is eating");
    }
}

class Dog extends Animal {
    void makeSound() {
        System.out.println("Dog barks");
    }
}
public class Inherit {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		 Dog d = new Dog();

	        d.eat();        
	        d.makeSound();

	}

}
